4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

brush-fill-rule

Generic function

Summary

Returns the fill rule of the brush.

Signature

brush-fill-rule brush => fill-rule

Arguments

brush
An instance of type <brush>.

Values

fill-rule
An instance of type fill-rule or <boolean>.

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

Returns the fill rule for brush, or #f if brush does not have a fill rule.

See also

brush-fill-style, page 128

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
